description: This file demonstrates how to use the thinking budget parameter with the Gemini model from the agno library, including setting up an agent to solve a classic river crossing puzzle and printing the response.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent that interacts with a language model.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A class representing the Gemini model from Google, used for AI tasks.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to print the response generated by the agent for a given task.
